block.p: After occasional peeks at Word, I returned to WordPerfect. And I intend to stay there. Word has a history of annoying features. The version before the current one wouldn't print a single-spaced address on an envelope. And the current version does not give an accurate location for the cursor. The horizontal location is stated in columns, a meaningless quantity if you are using a variable-spaced font. WordPerfect gives you the location accurately and is a real help for specialized layout.
GEORGE W. MCLELLAN Chapel Hill, N.C.
